content: easy beginner granny hexagon is turned into a mini merry holiday stocking any yarn and hook can be used have yarn scraps this is perfect mini project to use them for sell your finished goods at craft festivals as a set too this would also be great for baby showers or new moms and easily turned into party favors for any occasion you tube tutorial on this can be found on lisa s pine notes https //youtu be/npl5phwayi8 website jpg pattern click here http //www pinenotes com/2017minimerry html please email me if a pdf pattern is needed i do not have a pro designer raverly account or click website for jpg allow 24-48 hours for response we may be on different time zones lisapinenotes@gmail com
